alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Highland; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 3:59PM EDT until May 21 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Fayette County in central Ohio... Southwestern Pickaway County in central Ohio... Northeastern Highland County in southwestern Ohio... Northwestern Ross County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 359 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greenfield, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Greenfield, Good Hope, Frankfort, Clarksburg, South Salem, East Monroe, Andersonville, Lattaville, Austin and New Martinsburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
